pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial and Spatiotemporal SPDE-Based GLMMs with 'TMB' // Implements spatial and spatiotemporal predictive-process GLMMs (Generalized Linear Mixed Effect Models) using 'TMB', 'INLA', and the SPDE (Stochastic Partial Differential Equation) approximation to Gaussian random fields. One common application is for spatially explicit (and optionally dynamic) species distribution models (SDMs). See Anderson et al. (2022) doi:10.1101/2022.03.24.485545.
